tool.help:
GenesToDoE ==========
Extract genes for OptDoE
Install ------- ```sh [sudo] conda install -c conda-forge parts2doe
```
Use --- CLI ``` python -m parts2doe tests/data/input/lycopene.xml GeneParts.csv ```
Python module ```python from parts2doe import extract_genes
genes = extract_genes( sbml_file='tests/data/input/lycopene.xml' ) genes.to_csv('GeneParts.csv', index=False) ```
Tests ----- `pytest` is required and installable by: ``` conda install -c conda-forge pytest ```
Please follow instructions below to run tests: ``` python -m pytest ``` For further tests and development tools, a CI toolkit is provided in https://github.com/breakthewall/cicd-toolkit.
